name: Northeastern University
description: An intense research facility! We can funnel money to them and it will decrease every single of the apocalypse!! It is very costly though and it will keep taking money from you...

name: Google Headquarters
description: This is where a bulk of the AI research is being conducted; we need to funnel money to make sure that they don't get out of hand! They also will make us money with ad revenue!

name: HAARP Research Facility
description: This facility is researching the ionosphere and the capabilities of what can be done with that. It will help us further our forces against environmental damage and aliens; but it will also further the AI apocalypse

name: Secret Animal Testing Facility
description: This animal testing facility is unknown to the people of the United Kingdom. We can fund them to help understand the potential ape population better. No money will come of it though.

name: Indian Opioid Crisis Center
description: This is an emergency crisis center. For a large fee; they will decrease the opioid crisis in the world; no questions asked. Warning: This will also increase how fast it increases.

name: Australia Private Health Crisis Center
description: This is our own global health crisis center. These are our forces for biomedical emergencies like addiction and diseases. The technologies they use will increase the trickle of certain other apocalypses; however...

name: Spanish Health Research Institute
description: This will help our global health by studying diseases and viruses and what cause them. Will slow the incoming diseases and push them back. However; it will increase opioid chances.

name: Russia
description: This is our private intelligence office where we have been recruiting the best russian hackers money can buy. This will help spread propaganda and help defend against potential artificial intelligence and will massively boost our money trickle!!

name: Tokyo Mystery Box!
description: Who knows what this will do? This could do anything. Japan could increase our forces to 100 or completely eliminate the apocalypses altogether!

name: Johnson Space Center
description: This facility is helping us detect aliens and better prepare for their arrival. People also love this place and it will give back some money trickle!

name: The White House
description: This is where we will be able to set some policies that will help with the environment; artificial intelligence; opioid crisis; and the global health.  (They also will boost our military and intelligence forces a decent amount!) This; however will decrease our money trickle dramatically as the U.S is massively in debt.

name: Madagascar Private Environment Protection Center
description: This is our own privately owned environment protection agency. It will help us build up forces against environmental destruction. However; it will increase the chances of certain diseases

name: Brazil Private Military Base
description: This is our own privately owned military base; where we can build up our forces to quell potentially unavoidable militant conflict.
